1106578335587581953.text: Anyone that is interested in setting up a validator, please reach out to me, @cwgoes, @awasunyin or @CryptiumLabs! We are happy to burn 9 and send 1 atom to you to help facilitate more decentralisation in Cosmos and reach 100 validators sooner! @cosmos @cosmosvalidator

I wrote about it in my 2015 blog post The Death of Bitcoin: https://tonyarcieri.com/the-death-of-bitcoin …pic.twitter.com/ReuEaOmAFw

1100531373297741824.text:
In T-minus ~10 days, the Cosmos Hub mainnet will be ready to launch. Here's what to expect post-launch 

Launch process begins immediately after genesis TXs are collected.

 Validators: please follow the housekeeping procedure outlined in the blog.

The  is here yet.https://twitter.com/chjango/status/1100472394878148608 …

1100472394878148608.text:
The Cosmos Hub mainnet will roll out in 3 phases:

I: mainnet gains stability
II: transfers enabled
III: IBC enabled

Like the Mercury, Gemini, and the Apollo Missions, landing a human safely onto the  takes calculated, progressive steps.

#cosmoslaunchhttps://blog.cosmos.network/the-3-phases-of-the-cosmos-hub-mainnet-fdff3a68c4c0 …

1091904127477530624.text: We'r going to reward the validators who dedicated to building IRISnet in the past few months! About 6 million IRIS tokens will be given to 51 testnet participants. The average is 11w IRIS, and the highest rewards is 49.6w IRIS!https://medium.com/irisnet-blog/how-to-claim-rewards-of-fuxi-testnet-6fe5bd7263e6 …

1091172059642703872.text: Very compelling network analysis by @CertusOne of a single-entity cartel that presented itself in the @cosmos #GameofStakes. Even more interesting is the call for social consensus to coordinate an anti-cartel to save the network. #proofofstake https://link.medium.com/QqxLnbztWT

1091153097932587010.text: After watching the cartel in #GameOfStakes silently for a very long time, it's time to fork them out! @cosmos is defending itself from a 1/3+ cartel. Read everything in the PR -> https://github.com/cosmos/game-of-stakes/pull/263 …pic.twitter.com/FlSXulsHwY

1096528624780537856.text:
Yesterday we caught a critical bug in @cosmos which would have caused wrong inflation on mainnet and reduced the security of the network. 

The awesome @tendermint_team fixed it within 1 day. That's what you can call hard-working and ready for launch https://github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/issues/3646 …
